Content:
(a master of bad timing)
Today, I finally got my bike out of my shop after completing all the winter maintenance I had planned.
I"m on the road again!! (sort of)
Today was cold and windy. Never got out of the 30s here.
Damn! Once around the block was enough.
Tomorrow? More of the same, cold and windy again!!
And Saturday?? Forget Saturday! We're supposed to get as much as four inches of rain!
Just maybe I'll get to ride it Sunday.
😢

Title: It has begun!!
Author: Offcenter
